<title level="1" pfs="">[Resin-Seep Xulgath](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2107)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Resin-Seep Xulgath](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2107)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 195

**Weaknesses**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 10, slashing 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+11 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20,
**Damage** 1d8+11 piercing plus resin crust

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+11 slashing plus resin crust

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+11 piercing plus xulgath bile

**Resin Crust**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A creature damaged by a resin-seep xulgath's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a DC 28 Reflex save or be covered with clumps of noxious resin, taking 2d8 poison damage and a –15-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature is also [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 minute). The creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) for as long it has a Speed penalty. A creature can spend an Interact action to scrape the resin off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 with each such action.

**Resin Spray** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The resin-seep xulgath flexes its pores and emits a 30-foot line of resin that deals 3d12 poison damage and [knocks](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target 5 feet back (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save; on a success or critical success the target isn't knocked back, and on a critical failure the target is knocked back 10 feet). The resin-seep xulgath can't use Resin Spray again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
name: Resin-Seep Xulgath

text: Resin-Seep Xulgath Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 32 Unspecific Lore : DC 30 Specific Lore : DC 27 Resin-Seep Xulgath Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 51 Perception +19; darkvision Languages Draconic, Undercommon Skills Acrobatics +23, Athletics +20, Intimidation +16, Survival +19, Thievery +21 Str +4 Dex +5 Con +3 Int +1 Wis +3 Cha +0 Items +1 striking dagger --- AC 30 Fort +19 Ref +23 Will +17 HP 195 Weaknesses acid 10, slashing 10 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action dagger +21 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, versatile S), Damage 2d4+11 piercing Melee Single Action jaws +20, Damage 1d8+11 piercing plus resin crust Melee Single Action claw +20 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d6+11 slashing plus resin crust Ranged Single Action dagger +21 (Agile, Magical, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 2d4+11 piercing plus xulgath bile Resin Crust (Incapacitation, Poison) A creature damaged by a resin-seep xulgath's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a DC 28 Reflex save or be covered with clumps of noxious resin, taking 2d8 poison damage and a –15-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature is also clumsy 1 for 1 minute). The creature is sickened 1 for as long it has a Speed penalty. A creature can spend an Interact action to scrape the resin off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 with each such action. Resin Spray Two Actions (Poison) The resin-seep xulgath flexes its pores and emits a 30-foot line of resin that deals 3d12 poison damage and knocks the target 5 feet back (DC 28 basic Reflex save; on a success or critical success the target isn't knocked back, and on a critical failure the target is knocked back 10 feet). The resin-seep xulgath can't use Resin Spray again for 1d4 rounds.
